name: SpaceTown (thingspool)
description:
SpaceTown is a sci-fi battle strategy game, in which you can build your own future space city while fighting with space aliens.

Build your own space colony. Fight alien invaders from outer space!

As a commander of the galaxy's space crew, you are building a future city in the midst of an abandoned space station. But beware! This place is plagued with hordes of extraterrestrial species. Resist their invasion while expanding your territory!
